pr_title: Fix #1247: URL parameters are not escaped.

timeline.message: Fix #1247: URL parameters are not escaped.

timeline.bodyText:
I think you need to separate the arguments. > exec("echo", "'something here'");
Also the } in (W&RLD} looks like a typo
timeline.author: manusa

replies.bodyText: No I added that bracket to demonstrate that all of these characters are being escaped properly.
replies.author: dev-gaur

replies.bodyText: I understand, but then the assertion was inconsistent (changed now).
replies.author: manusa
